title: Patch Notes
content: against the poltergeists in Jannath's Estate. The Moonlight Slivers' Banishing Smite will now stop myrmidons from empowering Lorroakan if the myrmidons are successfully Banished. Enemies in High Hall should now leave combat when Knocked Out. The second wave of Intellect Devourers at the Morphic Pool should now consistently join combat. Fixed Gortash's Legendary Action not working when Blinded. To improve her chances of survival, Hope now has a new passive called Last Hope that grants her Death
